title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 13 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 13 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: How long wilt thou forget me, O LORD? for ever? how long wilt thou hide thy face from me?
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，你忘记我要到几时呢。要到永远吗。你掩面不顾我要到几时呢。

lineList.en: How long shall I take counsel in my soul, having sorrow in my heart daily? how long shall mine enemy be exalted over me?
lineList.cn: 我心里筹算，终日愁苦，要到几时呢。我的仇敌升高压制我，要到几时呢。

lineList.en: Consider and hear me, O LORD my God: lighten mine eyes, lest I sleep the sleep of death;
lineList.cn: 耶和华我的神阿，求你看顾我，应允我，使我眼目光明，免得我沉睡至死。

lineList.en: Lest mine enemy say, I have prevailed against him; and those that trouble me rejoice when I am moved.
lineList.cn: 免得我的仇敌说，我胜了他。免得我的敌人在我摇动的时候喜乐。

lineList.en: But I have trusted in thy mercy; my heart shall rejoice in thy salvation.
lineList.cn: 但我倚靠你的慈爱。我的心因你的救恩快乐。

lineList.en: I will sing unto the LORD, because he hath dealt bountifully with me.
lineList.cn: 我要向耶和华歌唱，因他用厚恩待我。
